faq.subtitle: Still Have Questions?
faq.description: We’re here to help. Reach out via email, chat, or a quick call.

q1.question: What is the project delivery time?
q1.answer: Timelines depend on scope and plan: Basic (7–10 days), Professional (15–21 days), Enterprise (30–45 days).

q2.question: Is support provided after project delivery?
q2.answer: Yes. Each plan includes free support—Basic (3 months), Professional (6 months), Enterprise (12 months).

q3.question: Can I request changes to the project?
q3.answer: Absolutely. We collaborate on reasonable changes during development, aligned with your plan.

q4.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q4.answer: We support common payment methods and can integrate gateways as needed.
